snippet.title: Noita - Reveal Trailer (Out now!)
snippet.description:
Noita is  now out on Early Access!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/88...
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/noita
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/noita  
itch.io: https://nollagames.itch.io/noita

Noita is a magical action roguelite set in a world where every pixel is physically simulated. Fight, explore, melt, burn, freeze and evaporate your way through the procedurally generated world using spells you've created yourself. 

Website: http://noitagame.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NollaGames
Tumblr: http://devlog.noitagame.com/ 
Press kit: https://noitagame.com/press/

The song is “The One That Watches” by From Grotto - https://fromgrotto.bandcamp.com/album/from-grotto

Noita is being developed by Nolla Games - http://nollagames.com/
